jawipeta thawa kalak yana thuru lankiya deshapalanaye nam karanna kisima karyabharayak na.ekama de peramunak gahala ejapaya balayata genna udawu wena eka.thun wani balawegayawath nowana jawipe atham wita wikramabahuge pakshaya wage weyi.jawipe ithihasaye yam sarthakathwayak labuwanam labuwe jathikathwaya ha baddha wimenuyi.in iwathwu sanin ada watuna.me lipiye thibenawayayi kiyana panthiyak saba lokaye nathi nisa ewani panthiyak niyojanaya karana pakshayak wada warjana karamin ( eewata kawuruth sahabhagi wethi chanda paradimin boru sanwada karamin bodlali pakshayak bawata path wannata sidu wewi.jawipe iranama eyayi.peratugamin nathi nisa kampaswala nawakawadewath denna bari mattamata watilane.

i thama ba a muwa ithi tha ala maya ati aana aa wath atu anu u math as ani uthu thara ath ek/ak alu ‘i’ prathyaya uda - rata + i = rati daham + i = dahami naw + i = nawi ‘muwa’prathyaya uda - dawa + muwa = dawamuwa sel + muwa = selmuwa ran + muwa = ranmuwa ‘maya’ prathyaya uda - mini + maya = minimaya ran + maya = ranmaya loha + maya = lohamaya ‘wath’ prathyaya uda - kula + wath = kulawath dhana + wath = dhanawath pin + wath = pinwath ‘math’prathyaya uda - diri + math = dirimath prithi + math = prithimath isura + math = isuramath ‘thara’prathyaya uda - gara + thara = garathara mahalu + thara = mahaluthara bala + thara = balathara ‘thama’prathyaya uda - wishala + thama = wishalathama sondura + thama = sondurathama priya + thama = priyathama ‘ithi’ prathyaya uda - kanda + ithi = kandithi sunga + ithi = singithi diya + ithi = diyathi ‘ati’prathyaya inga + ati = ingati kalu + ati = kalati kara + ati = karati ‘atu’prathyaya uda - boka + atu = bokutu waka + atu = wakutu kasa + atu = kasatu ‘as’prathyaya uda - sisila + as = sisilas warala + as = waralas miyura + as = miyuras ‘ath’ prathyaya uda - muduna + ath = mudunath nalala + ath = nalalath sawana + ath = sawanath ‘ba’prathyaya uda - me + ba = moba e + ba = oba ‘tha’prathyaya uda - kusala + tha = kusalatha dubala + tha = dubalatha ‘aana’ prathyaya uda - raja + aana = rajana piya + aana = piyana ‘anu’prathyaya uda - putha + anu = puthanu mala + anu = malanu ‘ani’prathyaya uda - duwa + ani = duwani ma + ani = mani ‘ek/ak’prathyaya uda - dara + ek = darawek sthri + ak = sthriyak ‘a’prathyaya uda - gam + a = gama dig + a = diga ‘ala’prathyaya uda - pa + ala = pahala sihil + ala = sihilala ‘aa’prathyaya uda - nihanda + aa = nihandiya hadi + aa = hadiya ‘u’prathyaya uda - neth + u = nethu sith + u = sithu ‘uthu’prathyaya uda - andi + uthu = aanduthu ‘alu’prathyaya uda - sith + alu = sithalu gata + alu = gatalu krudantha dhathu prakruthiyata pera hewath kriya prakruthiyakata pasuwa prathyayan yedi e mangin kriya mulaya artha ganwena heyin krudantha nama prathyartha nama wisheshayak lesa dakwe.
